name: Mustafa Doğukan Kıymet
title: Game Developer, AI Engineering, Machine Learning
bio: I am a second-year Artificial Intelligence Engineering student at Adana Alparslan Türkeş University of Science and Technology, as well as the founder and current president of the DnD and Board Games Club. I have been working with Unity for the past three years, during which I have developed and published several projects.

projects.title: Nine Lifes Nine Deaths
projects.description: Lead Developer & Programmer for a Vampire Survivors-inspired bullet hell roguelite. Designed and implemented 27 unique weapons, 12 passive abilities, and 9 biomes. Developed scalable modular weapon and ability systems with Unity C#. Optimized performance for high-entity counts and procedural enemy spawning.

projects.title: Boundries
projects.description: Gameplay Programmer for a 2D platform puzzle game centered around glitch mechanics. Designed unique puzzle logic involving reality distortion and glitch-based challenges. Implemented time and state tracking systems to control glitch interactions.

projects.title: Robby Raccoon
projects.description: Gameplay & Systems Programmer for a fast-paced bullet hell boss game with time rewind mechanics. Designed and implemented a dynamic time-reversal system allowing players to undo actions. Focused on tight control feel and readable but challenging boss patterns.

projects.title: Timeloop Arena
projects.description: Solo project featuring player movement & health, shooting system, time-rewind mechanic, boss AI, bullet-hell patterns, and retro-style shaders. Developed entirely solo except music.

projects.title: Window Walker
projects.description: Brackeys Game Jam entry. Implemented player movement, moving platforms, laser traps, portal system, and interactive switches as Gameplay Programmer.

projects.title: Fisherman's Storm
projects.description: Designed fishing system with probability mechanics (rarity based on distance), fish selling & inventory system. Role: Gameplay Programmer.

projects.title: Titanic - Machine Learning from Disaster
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using linear regression for the Titanic dataset competition, achieving an optimization level of 0.4.

projects.title: Adversarial Art Protection
projects.description: A defensive security tool that adds imperceptible perturbations to images to protect artwork from unauthorized AI model training.

projects.title: Weapon & Passive System - Complete Roguelike Framework
projects.description: A production-ready, flexible weapon and passive item system for Unity, perfect for creating Vampire Survivors-like

projects.title: 2D Enemy AI System
projects.description: Complete 2D enemy AI with A* pathfinding, FOV detection, patrol behaviors. Includes Guards, Dogs, Cameras & Motion Sensors. Fully documented & extensible.

experience.title: Founder & President
experience.description: Founded and currently serve as president of the university's DnD and Board Games Club, organizing events and fostering a community of tabletop gaming enthusiasts.

education.institution: Adana Alparslan Türkeş University of Science and Technology
education.description: Currently pursuing studies in AI Engineering with focus on machine learning, deep learning, and game development integration.
